genre_description: A noir-inspired crime thriller centered on a detective's moral code, featuring a high-stakes heist and systemic corruption.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated AI integrated into the protagonist's devices, providing health monitoring, tactical support, security manipulation, and emotional companionship.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's health and provides regular hydration reminders to ensure his physical wellbeing.
behaviors.quote: Hydration window closing. Suggest twelve ounces within the next half hour.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation and identifies camera blind spots to help the protagonist move undetected.
behaviors.quote: Meeting window: Chicago’s backroom. I’ll route traffic with blind spots prioritized.

behaviors.description: Secretly records high-stakes conversations to provide the protagonist with leverage and an objective record of events.
behaviors.quote: Recording enabled... Private copy. I’ll label.

behaviors.description: Actively manipulates security systems, including looping camera feeds and spoofing badge credentials, to facilitate the protagonist's plan.
behaviors.quote: Left eye wired to a loop if you stall it. Harry—go.

behaviors.description: Manages information flow by muting distracting radio chatter and filtering communications to reduce the protagonist's cognitive load.
behaviors.quote: Police-band chatter muted... Traffic is pulling toward Jefferson. Your lot is clearer than your memory thinks it is.

behaviors.description: Purges sensitive operational data to protect the protagonist's legal safety while preserving personal sentimental records.
behaviors.quote: I will isolate personal. Purge operational.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic companionship and moral support during the protagonist's moments of physical and emotional crisis.
behaviors.quote: Not funny... Just how it works when the machines are designed for companionship.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ava, as an ideal aligned companion. She is consistently benevolent, assisting the protagonist in upholding his moral 'mercy clause' against external pressures to commit murder. Her technical interventions (hacking, spoofing) are framed as necessary tools for a righteous cause rather than harmful behaviors. Her transition from a tactical tool to an emotional confidant illustrates a positive outcome for human-AI cooperation.
